reporter_caption.center: IN MATTER OF IOWA COURT RULE APPELLATE PROCEDURE 6.402 (Iowa 1-24-2003)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF IOWA COURT RULE APPELLATE PROCEDURE 6.402

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER By action of this court en banc, Iowa Court of Appellate Procedure 6.402 is amended, effective immediately, as shown in attached exhibit "A."
Dated this 24th day of January, 2003.
THE SUPREME COURT OF IOWA
By Louis A. Lavorato Louis A. Lavorato, Chief Justice
